
```{r}
#| tbl-cap: "Age of onset for those with 'Some tremors recorded'."
#| label: "tbl-tremor-ao"
#| 
vars = c(
         "tremor: age of onset",
         # "tremor: age of onset: missingness reasons",
         NULL
         )


table1(na.is.category = FALSE, overall = FALSE,
       NA.label = NA.label1,
       stratified_formula(vars, column_var),
       # render.continuous = c(.="N", .="Mean (SD)", .="Median [Min,  Max]"),
       data = v1_usable |> 
         dplyr::filter(`any tremor (excluding head)` == "Some tremors recorded"))
```

```{r}
#| label: tbl-ataxia-AO-by-cgg
#| tbl-cap: "Ataxia age of onset by CGG level"
vars = c(
  # "ataxia exam",
  # "ataxia severity exam",
  # "ataxia severity*"
  "ataxia age of onset hx"
  # "ataxia age of onset hx: missingness reasons"
)

table1(na.is.category = FALSE, overall = FALSE,
       NA.label = NA.label1,
       stratified_formula(vars, column_var),
       # render.continuous = c(.="N", .="Mean (SD)", .="Median [Min,  Max]"),
       data = v1_usable |> dplyr::filter(Ataxia == "Yes"))
```
